main event: An object was observed circling very brightly and appeared to pulsate over Rushville, Illinois on January 28, 1958.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 10 minutes,The object was reported as one and did not have any visible tail or exhaust,The object exhibited a very bright appearance,There was no wind or weather data available during the observation, A crew chief checked with Springfield Tower for possible aircraft or other visual sightings but found none.
witness description: Crew Chief S/SGT Newcome checked with Springfield Tower and surveyed the area.
